translation: Back then, I didn't know.{#Name="Mikhail"}

source: Infiltrate the Cathedral.{#Name=" "}

source: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name=" "}

source: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name=" "}

source: Defeat Gabriel!{#Name=" "}

source: All units, retreat! Retreeeat!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Are you mad? What good'll running do?{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Are you mad? What good'll running do?{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: We can't defeat her...{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: We can't defeat her...{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Enemy sighted! What the...?{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Enemy sighted! What the...?{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: What is it?{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: What is it?{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: She's alone. Zero's by herself!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: She's alone. Zero's by herself!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: She's wounded!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: She's wounded!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Come on! We can still do this!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Come on! We can still do this!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Anyone who can fight, get to the front! Defend us!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Anyone who can fight, get to the front! Defend us!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: I'm still in this!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: I'm still in this!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Me, too!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Me, too!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: So that's the accursed Intoner...{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: So that's the accursed Intoner...{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Kill her! Kill her! Kiiiiiill!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Kill her! Kill her! Kiiiiiill!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: She doesn't seem to be weakened!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: She doesn't seem to be weakened!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Damned Intoner...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Damned Intoner...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Help! She's breaking through!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Help! She's breaking through!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Stop her, no matter what! For Lady One!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Stop her, no matter what! For Lady One!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Aaaaahh!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Aaaaahh!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Enough already! We're wasting good soldiers' lives!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Enough already! We're wasting good soldiers' lives!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: 戦なんて、最初から全部無駄だ{#Name="兵士Ｆ"}
source: 戦なんて、最初から全部無駄だ{#Name="兵士Ｆ"}

translation: ……前進！{#Name="兵士Ａ"}
source: ……前進！{#Name="兵士Ａ"}

translation: If I die here, I regret nothing!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: If I die here, I regret nothing!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Lady One must remain safe! If not, the whole world is in danger!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Lady One must remain safe! If not, the whole world is in danger!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: ああ…ワン様を守りぬこう。それが、世界を守ることになる！{#Name="兵士Ｅ"}
source: ああ…ワン様を守りぬこう。それが、世界を守ることになる！{#Name="兵士Ｅ"}

translation: All our soldiers are wounded!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: All our soldiers are wounded!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: No retreat! Keep going!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: No retreat! Keep going!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Holy shit, it's Zero! She's here!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Holy shit, it's Zero! She's here!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Anyone else?{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Anyone else?{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: No, sir! She appears to be alone!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: No, sir! She appears to be alone!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: What happened to her friends?{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: What happened to her friends?{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: She probably used 'em up and then killed 'em!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: She probably used 'em up and then killed 'em!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: I don't see any disciples!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: I don't see any disciples!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Forward! Forward!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Forward! Forward!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: The front line's...wiped out?{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: The front line's...wiped out?{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: It doesn't matter!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: It doesn't matter!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Stand strong! Forward!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Stand strong! Forward!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: I...I can't do it! That woman is a monster!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: I...I can't do it! That woman is a monster!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Belay that talk!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Belay that talk!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Attack! Sacrifice your own men if needs be!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Attack! Sacrifice your own men if needs be!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: All that matters is Lady One's safety!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: All that matters is Lady One's safety!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: ワン様が無事ならそれでいい！{#Name="兵士Ａ"}
source: ワン様が無事ならそれでいい！{#Name="兵士Ａ"}

translation: Wounded! I've got wounded here!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Wounded! I've got wounded here!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: There's a man down over here, too!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: There's a man down over here, too!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: 自分達でなんとかしろ！救護班もやられておる{#Name="兵士Ｆ"}
source: 自分達でなんとかしろ！救護班もやられておる{#Name="兵士Ｆ"}

translation: Get away! Get away from meee!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Get away! Get away from meee!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Calm down! You're out of formation!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Calm down! You're out of formation!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Don't give up! Keep pushing!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Don't give up! Keep pushing!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Stop her! Stop her now!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Stop her! Stop her now!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Intoner or not, how can one woman{LF}fight off all these troops?{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Intoner or not, how can one woman{LF}fight off all these troops?{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: She's trying to end the world by herself.{LF}She's obviously pretty fuckin' strong!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: She's trying to end the world by herself.{LF}She's obviously pretty fuckin' strong!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: This is hell on earth...{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: This is hell on earth...{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Don't lose your nerve! We can do this, all right?{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Don't lose your nerve! We can do this, all right?{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Mother? Mother! M-Motherrrrr...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Mother? Mother! M-Motherrrrr...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Pull it together, man! For cryin' out loud!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Pull it together, man! For cryin' out loud!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Mother! Help me! Help meeeeee!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Mother! Help me! Help meeeeee!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Dammit! If this keeps up, Lady One's in trouble!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Dammit! If this keeps up, Lady One's in trouble!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Protect the Cathedral! Don't let Zero inside!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Protect the Cathedral! Don't let Zero inside!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Whatcha readin'?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Whatcha readin'?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Ah, Zero.{#Name="One"}
source: Ah, Zero.{#Name="One"}

translation: It's a record of life in the Cathedral City.{#Name="One"}
source: It's a record of life in the Cathedral City.{#Name="One"}

translation: A record of life?{#Name="Zero"}
source: A record of life?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero, don't you think it's strange?{#Name="One"}
source: Zero, don't you think it's strange?{#Name="One"}

translation: This city is said to be the origin of all magic.{#Name="One"}
source: This city is said to be the origin of all magic.{#Name="One"}

translation: Spells were crafted here that even now are far beyond our abilities.{#Name="One"}
source: Spells were crafted here that even now are far beyond our abilities.{#Name="One"}

translation: Where did this knowledge go? When did we lose it?{#Name="One"}
source: Where did this knowledge go? When did we lose it?{#Name="One"}

translation: And what happened to the people who once possessed it?{#Name="One"}
source: And what happened to the people who once possessed it?{#Name="One"}

translation: I thought if I studied that, I might be able{LF}to learn the purpose of Intoners. Of...us.{#Name="One"}
source: I thought if I studied that, I might be able{LF}to learn the purpose of Intoners. Of...us.{#Name="One"}

translation: Only an idiot tries to learn about a bunch of shit{LF}she doesn't need to know. Or did you not know that?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Only an idiot tries to learn about a bunch of shit{LF}she doesn't need to know. Or did you not know that?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That's rather close-minded.{#Name="One"}
source: That's rather close-minded.{#Name="One"}

translation: Though, in the sense that we cannot ever truly know everything...{LF}Well, I suppose I agree.{#Name="One"}
source: Though, in the sense that we cannot ever truly know everything...{LF}Well, I suppose I agree.{#Name="One"}

translation: Whatever.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Whatever.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm about to kill you anyway. That's all that matters.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm about to kill you anyway. That's all that matters.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...So predictable.{#Name="One"}
source: ...So predictable.{#Name="One"}

translation: Come to me, Gabriel.{#Name="One"}
source: Come to me, Gabriel.{#Name="One"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Dragon!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Dragon!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You all right!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You all right!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Y-Yeah...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Y-Yeah...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: But that guy's strong... He's really, really strong!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: But that guy's strong... He's really, really strong!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Zero, get on! Let's beat him together!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero, get on! Let's beat him together!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I know how this goes, my sister.{#Name="One"}
source: I know how this goes, my sister.{#Name="One"}

translation: Not even you can recover from a mortal dragon wound.{#Name="One"}
source: Not even you can recover from a mortal dragon wound.{#Name="One"}

translation: Then I guess I just have to kill you first!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Then I guess I just have to kill you first!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You and your daemon dragon...{#Name="Zero"}
source: You and your daemon dragon...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Huh? What's that mean?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Huh? What's that mean?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: It means she enhanced her dragon{LF}to make it better at fighting you.{#Name="Zero"}
source: It means she enhanced her dragon{LF}to make it better at fighting you.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But when you do that...{#Name="Zero"}
source: But when you do that...{#Name="Zero"}

source: Hey, Zero? Why are we fighting?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Are you seriously asking me that now?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Are you seriously asking me that now?{#Name="Zero"}

source: I mean... It's just kind of sad, you know?{LF}It's sad.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I feel really bad for Gabriel.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I feel really bad for Gabriel.{#Name="Mikhail"}

source: Really? You feel bad for the fucker{LF}that's trying to kill you!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Dammit! Does anything hurt him!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Dammit! Does anything hurt him!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: You all right!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You all right!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Shit!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shit!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Reincarnate! Even if you lose your memory, at least you'll still—{#Name="Zero"}
source: Reincarnate! Even if you lose your memory, at least you'll still—{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You know, right, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: You know, right, Zero?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Why dragons can be reborn? Because they get a "final wish."{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Why dragons can be reborn? Because they get a "final wish."{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Enough! Just hurry up and do it already!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Enough! Just hurry up and do it already!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: A dragon's wish is a deep and powerful thing...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: A dragon's wish is a deep and powerful thing...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: So now, I'm gonna make mine.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: So now, I'm gonna make mine.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: And I'm gonna kill that dragon!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: And I'm gonna kill that dragon!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: What're you saying!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What're you saying!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: If I use my life to wish it...then I can make it happen. Isn't that great!?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: If I use my life to wish it...then I can make it happen. Isn't that great!?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: ...No. No! No, no, no! I'm not letting you do this! NO!{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...No. No! No, no, no! I'm not letting you do this! NO!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's okay, Zero.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: It's okay, Zero.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: If I lose my memory, I won't be me anymore anyway.{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: If I lose my memory, I won't be me anymore anyway.{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: No! No, no... Please, no...{#Name="Zero"}
source: No! No, no... Please, no...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: And besides... I had a lot of fun, Zero...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: And besides... I had a lot of fun, Zero...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I mean, being with you...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I mean, being with you...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Mikhail, no! You can't! I won't let you!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Mikhail, no! You can't! I won't let you!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Heh... Look at that... You finally used my name... My...name...{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Heh... Look at that... You finally used my name... My...name...{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Goddammit, dummy... Stop repeating things...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Goddammit, dummy... Stop repeating things...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Mik...hail...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Mik...hail...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You're...not...{#Name="One"}
source: You're...not...{#Name="One"}

translation: the only one...who's ready...to sacrifice everything...{#Name="One"}
source: the only one...who's ready...to sacrifice everything...{#Name="One"}

translation: I will protect Gabriel...{#Name="One"}
source: I will protect Gabriel...{#Name="One"}

translation: Even if... Even if I forsake my life...as an Intoner!{#Name="One"}
source: Even if... Even if I forsake my life...as an Intoner!{#Name="One"}

translation: Come for me, Zero!{#Name="One"}
source: Come for me, Zero!{#Name="One"}

translation: Die!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Die!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You comprehend nothing!{#Name="One"}
source: You comprehend nothing!{#Name="One"}

translation: You destroy the peace we created!{#Name="One"}
source: You destroy the peace we created!{#Name="One"}

translation: You kill your own flesh and blood!{#Name="One"}
source: You kill your own flesh and blood!{#Name="One"}

translation: And then...you think...{#Name="One"}
source: And then...you think...{#Name="One"}

translation: You think you can save the WORLD!?{#Name="One"}
source: You think you can save the WORLD!?{#Name="One"}

translation: You done running your mouth yet?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You done running your mouth yet?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Mikhail...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Mikhail...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Why wasn't it me...?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Why wasn't it me...?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Mikhail... Mikhail still had a future...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Mikhail... Mikhail still had a future...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Damn it. Goddamn it all!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Damn it. Goddamn it all!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Do you honestly think this will{LF}be enough to destroy us!?{#Name="One"}
source: Do you honestly think this will{LF}be enough to destroy us!?{#Name="One"}

translation: All of us... Five, Four, Three, Two, and One...{#Name="One"}
source: All of us... Five, Four, Three, Two, and One...{#Name="One"}

translation: We won't lose, Zero! And the world won't, either!{#Name="One"}
source: We won't lose, Zero! And the world won't, either!{#Name="One"}

translation: You're the monster who made{LF}the Intoners in the first place!{#Name="One"}
source: You're the monster who made{LF}the Intoners in the first place!{#Name="One"}

translation: Dammit...{#Name="One"}
source: Dammit...{#Name="One"}

translation: Farewell, Gabriel...{#Name="One"}
source: Farewell, Gabriel...{#Name="One"}

translation: I'm...sorry...{#Name="One"}
source: I'm...sorry...{#Name="One"}

translation: ......{#Name="Zero"}
source: ......{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So this is...{#Name="One"}
source: So this is...{#Name="One"}

translation: Good...bye...{#Name="One"}
source: Good...bye...{#Name="One"}

translation: Yeah. It is.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah. It is.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Mikhail... It's over.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Mikhail... It's over.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Now I—{#Name="Zero"}
source: Now I—{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: O-One!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: O-One!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But how...?{#Name="Zero"}
source: But how...?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Brother.{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: Brother.{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm One's brother.{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: I'm One's brother.{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: Brother? That's...impossible...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Brother? That's...impossible...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You wouldn't know. You only had your five sisters.{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: You wouldn't know. You only had your five sisters.{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: But in the same way you "created" your sisters...{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: But in the same way you "created" your sisters...{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: Your sister One created me.{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: Your sister One created me.{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: I was a failsafe in case you managed to kill her.{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: I was a failsafe in case you managed to kill her.{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: I was her final weapon.{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: I was her final weapon.{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: See this sword? It's made from a dragon's fang.{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: See this sword? It's made from a dragon's fang.{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: That means it can kill an Intoner, right?{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: That means it can kill an Intoner, right?{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: I...see...{#Name="Zero"}
source: I...see...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You have no one to blame but yourself, murderer!{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: You have no one to blame but yourself, murderer!{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: I don't...blame...anyone.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I don't...blame...anyone.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I just want to kill the Intoners. ...All of them.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I just want to kill the Intoners. ...All of them.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You think after all this I intended to...survive?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You think after all this I intended to...survive?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The world doesn't...work that way...{#Name="Zero"}
source: The world doesn't...work that way...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: At last...it's all over...{#Name="Zero"}
source: At last...it's all over...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Mik...hail.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Mik...hail.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Thank y—{#Name="Zero"}
source: Thank y—{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...She's dead.{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: ...She's dead.{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: Zero is dead.{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: Zero is dead.{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: One, do you hear me?{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: One, do you hear me?{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: I finished off the Intoners, just like you said!{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: I finished off the Intoners, just like you said!{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: But...what should I do now?{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: But...what should I do now?{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: How am I supposed to live...in a world that lacks the Intoners' protection?{#Name="? ? ?"}
source: How am I supposed to live...in a world that lacks the Intoners' protection?{#Name="? ? ?"}

translation: I see... If there are no Intoners left to protect the world...{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(One's Brother)"}
source: I see... If there are no Intoners left to protect the world...{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(One's Brother)"}

translation: Then I'll just protect it myself!{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(One's Brother)"}
source: Then I'll just protect it myself!{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(One's Brother)"}

translation: We'll form a new religion.{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(One's Brother)"}
source: We'll form a new religion.{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(One's Brother)"}

translation: A religion that worships my sister, One.{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(One's Brother)"}
source: A religion that worships my sister, One.{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(One's Brother)"}

translation: ...No, I am the true One.{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(One's Brother)"}
source: ...No, I am the true One.{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(One's Brother)"}

translation: From this day forward, all will call ME One!{#Name="One{0A}(One's Brother)"}
source: From this day forward, all will call ME One!{#Name="One{0A}(One's Brother)"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="One{0A}(One's Brother)"}

translation: I should have known this branch would also end like this.{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(Accord)"}
source: I should have known this branch would also end like this.{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(Accord)"}

translation: Seems like we should've taken a different branch somewhere along the way...{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(Accord)"}
source: Seems like we should've taken a different branch somewhere along the way...{#Name="? ? ?{0A}(Accord)"}

translation: Zero! My attacks aren't working!{LF}They aren't working!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero! My attacks aren't working!{LF}They aren't working!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Slam into him once he opens his big, fat mouth!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Slam into him once he opens his big, fat mouth!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: If a good smack in the mouth don't work,{LF}I dunno what will. Such a pain...{#Name="Zero"}
source: If a good smack in the mouth don't work,{LF}I dunno what will. Such a pain...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm gonna hit my head if I fly around in here!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: I'm gonna hit my head if I fly around in here!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Maybe that'll smarten you up a bit!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Maybe that'll smarten you up a bit!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That's mean, Zero! Look, I'm not flying in here!{LF}I'm not!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: That's mean, Zero! Look, I'm not flying in here!{LF}I'm not!{#Name="Mikhail"}
